profile.title: Proposed FMN Spiral 4 Business Support Profile

description.para: The Business Support Profile supports the Business Support Services to provide the means to facilitate other service and data providers on the enterprise network by providing and managing underlying capabilities for collaboration and information management. These services are enablers used by other services and users across the whole network-enabled enterprise, acting as "building blocks" for developing more sophisticated Community Of Interest (COI) services and applications.
